name: Mushroom Farmer
description:
Farm mushrooms! How many can you harvest within the time limit?

Created for GBJam7.

Notes: The web browser playable is an updated version of the original submission due to resolution issues. The downloadable file is our original submission.

controls

  • Space - start game
  • arrow keys - movement
  • Z - pick up and interact with items
  • X - give LOVE

credits

  • Ashley - audio
  • Danielle - art
  • Jo - game design, art
  • Wan-Teen - programming
